analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.textnormalizer.transformation.RegexBasedTokenTransformer
analysisEngineMetaData.description:
A JCasTransformerChangeBased_ImplBase implementation that replaces tokens based on a regular expressions.

The parameters #PARAM_REGEX defines the regular expression to be searcher, #PARAM_REPLACEMENT defines the string with which matching patterns are replaces.

configurationParameter.name: regex
configurationParameter.description: Define the regular expression to be replaced

configurationParameter.name: replacement
configurationParameter.description: Define the string to replace matching tokens with

configurationParameter.name: typesToCopy
configurationParameter.description: A list of fully qualified type names that should be copied to the transformed CAS where available. By default, no types are copied apart from DocumentMetaData, i.e. all other annotations are omitted.
